io.konik.zugferd.unqualified

Class ZfDate

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Date
      • io.konik.zugferd.unqualified.ZfDate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable<Date>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ZfDateDay, ZfDateMonth, ZfDateWeek

    public abstract class ZfDate
extends Date

    ZUGFeRD Specific Date with a format code.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
